price: Obia ͻbͻ ne ho ban wͻ εberε a obi adi no amim no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no deε εnsεsε yεfa kwan bi so tia wͻn (anaa yɛbɔ wͻn soboɔ).
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
